thread.section_title: Hotel Diva Opera - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good value and well located
thread.title_full: Good value and well located - Review of Hotel Diva Opera, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Bake527
title: Good value and well located
text:
Spent a couple of nights in Paris en route to Northern France. Diva is well located to Opera area 20 mins walk e.g. La Fayette shopping. Close to Metro station Grande Boulevarde and good proximity to Garde Norde (short taxi ride) for TGV or Eurostar.
Close to Cafes and Restaurants and a doable long walk to Louvre etc or bus/metro.
Room had a verandah view to Sacre Cur, reasonable size for Paris and Hotel staff were helpful with multiple requests.
